page.title: 02Dale House Farm
page.content: { Dale House Farm}is farmed by the Holloway family.It is 1km south of { {Withybrook.}The soil is medium to heavy clay , good wheat and grassland. They own 240 acres and rent a further 30 acres making 22 fields .The farm is mostly dairy with some winter corn grown .They have 120 {Friesian}cows for milk and 20{Hereford heifers for beef .Each{Friesian}cow produces 5.7 gallons of milk each day .Each cow needs 0.5 acres for grazing and 0.5 acres for foraging.The dairy herd is kept inside each night from{September to April. There is a large barn with room for 100 cows a separate building with 124 cubicles.A second barn is used for rearing stock.The cows are freezebranded by using ice on a copper band.Most of the cows also have names.
